description:
Suffering a personal injury may be one of the most upsetting incidents someone in Brighton, Colorado, may ever experience. At the law office of Dugan & Campbell, PLLC, qualified and professional attorneys successfully handle a range of such cases. They are compassionate toward a client's circumstances and aggressive in their pursuit of compensation. The team routinely secures favorable verdicts and settlements in matters such as:

  • Car, motorcycle and truck accidents
  • Premises liability and slip-and-falls
  • Wrongful death
  • Insurance bad faith claims
  • Catastrophic injuries

The team at this law office brings relevant backgrounds to the practice. Attorney Heather Campbell formerly worked at an insurance defense firm, which gives her the ability to anticipate how the other side of a case may act. Attorney Chris Dugan spent years as a firefighter and emergency medical technician. He has seen firsthand how acts of wrongdoing have profound effects on victims and their families.

Taking every measure possible to accommodate clients, this law office provides personal service and accepts credit cards. The attorneys here are recognized for their work, holding an Avvo "Superb" rating and being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40. Dugan & Campbell, PLLC, serves people throughout the Denver area and Adams County.
